biotools.summary: SPRITE is a protein structural motif database searching program. Users can upload a PDB file of a query protein structure, and SPRITE compares the input coordinates to a database of 3D side chain arrangements of sites and motifs using a graph theoretical approach.

bioschemas.name: SPRITE
bioschemas.summary: SPRITE is a protein structural motif database searching program. Users can upload a PDB file of a query protein structure, and SPRITE compares the input coordinates to a database of 3D side chain arrangements of sites and motifs using a graph theoretical approach.
